String.Source: You should tackle your fear head on. If I brought you a skeever tail...
String.Dest: 你应该解决恐惧的源头。如果我给你带来一个雪鼠尾巴……

String.Source: No! Get it away from me!
String.Dest: 不！离我远点儿！

String.Source: (Let him finish)
String.Dest: （听他说完）

String.Source: ...a dozen wives, one for each inch. I know you don't need me to explain that part.
String.Dest: ...a dozen wives, one for each inch. I know you don't need me to explain that part.

String.Source: Skeevers stay underground. Just avoid caves and basements and you'll be fine.
String.Dest: 雪鼠只在地下出没，所以只要远离洞穴和地下室就不会出事。

String.Source: That's what the sellswords told me before they took me to a tavern filled with the furry demons.
String.Dest: 这就是那些佣兵在带我去充满毛茸茸的恶魔的酒馆之前说的。

String.Source: Skeevers stay underground. Just avoid caves and basements and you'll be fine.
String.Dest: 雪鼠只在地下出没，所以只要远离洞穴和地下室就不会出事。

String.Source: Fool me once, shame on you. Fool me twice, shame on me. And by that I mean I think you're lying.
String.Dest: 骗我一次，是你不要脸。第二次还骗到我，是我蠢。也就是说，我认为你在撒谎。

String.Source: What do you want, Lich breath? That's right, I said your breath smells like it came from a corpse, controlled by a mage in a bottle. What of it?
String.Dest: What do you want, Lich breath? That's right, I said your breath smells like it came from a corpse, controlled by a mage in a bottle. What of it?

String.Source: Um...what?
String.Dest: 呃...什么？

String.Source: Did I stutter? No I didn't, which is why I'm asking the question. To point out what a bad listener you are.
String.Dest: Did I stutter? No I didn't, which is why I'm asking the question. To point out what a bad listener you are.

String.Source: If my breath really smelled like a Lich, that'd make me one.
String.Dest: 如果我的气息闻起来确实像个尸巫，那就当我是好了。

String.Source: No it wouldn't. You think like Mul and Gadba. I urge you to go talk to them, and see if that's a compliment.
String.Dest: 不，不会的。你跟德霸以及莫尔想的一样。我劝你去和他们聊聊，看那是否算是恭维。

String.Source: You're right. My breath does smell like it came from a Lich.
String.Dest: 没错。我的气息闻起来就像个死尸（巫妖 死灵法师？）。

String.Source: I think there's a cure for that. It's called not eating dead things.
String.Dest: 我觉得这病还是有药可救的。就是“不要食腐”。

String.Source: It takes a brave man to admit a fear, and a stupid one to blurt it out rambling.
String.Dest: 这就像勇者承认恐惧，愚人开始唠叨一样。

String.Source: Alright, you got me there, and by got me I mean I gave it to you.
String.Dest: 好吧，你还真问住我了，既然问倒我了就把这个给你吧。

String.Source: What exactly is this aunt problem you're having?
String.Dest: 你究竟有啥鸡毛问题？

String.Source: Didn't think I had to. Has to be the worst kept secret in the whole Stronghold.
String.Dest: 真没想到。我居然会是整个要塞最需要保守的秘密。

String.Source: What exactly is this aunt problem you're having?
String.Dest: 你究竟有啥鸡毛问题？

String.Source: Except it is a secret, because the miners are idiots and everyone else is in denial. Lot easier to believe in a curse than doubt the ones you trust.
String.Dest: Except it is a secret, because the miners are idiots and everyone else is in denial. Lot easier to believe in a curse than doubt the ones you trust.

String.Source: What exactly is this aunt problem you're having?
String.Dest: 你究竟有啥鸡毛问题？

String.Source: All I'll say is this. As far the aunts are concerned, ain't no female good enough for their nephew, and by good enough I mean dead enough.
String.Dest: All I'll say is this. As far the aunts are concerned, ain't no female good enough for their nephew, and by good enough I mean dead enough.

String.Source: If you saw me in battle, you wouldn't provoke me.
String.Dest: 要是见过我在战场上的样子，你肯定不敢来招惹我。

String.Source: If I saw you in battle, I reckon I'd toss and turn and clutch my pillow, because that's what you do when you're dreaming.
String.Dest: 如果我在战斗中看到你，那我估计我会翻来倒去并抓紧我的枕头，大家做梦的时候都是那样的。

String.Source: What's your name?
String.Dest: 你叫什么名字?

String.Source: They call me Gromash. Pretty soon I'm gonna be Chief Gromash, so you might as well get used to the title and the name.
String.Dest: 他们叫我格里摩西。很快我就是首席格里摩西大人了，所以你最好赶快习惯这个头衔和称号。

String.Source: If it's Solitude, there's only one place they could've been taking you.
String.Dest: 如果它在独孤城，只有一个地方他们可以一直带着你。

String.Source: Wasn't till we got there that I saw the sign. Wasn't even a picture of a skeever. Just the words. But I was petrified.
String.Dest: 直到我们到了那里我才看见那个标记。甚至没有雪鼠的图案。只有文字。但是我惊呆了。

String.Source: If it's Solitude, there's only one place they could've been taking you.
String.Dest: 如果它在独孤城，只有一个地方他们可以一直带着你。

String.Source: So petrified I didn't even notice some drunken lout left his dinner on my boot. That made them mercs real happy though.
String.Dest: 所以目瞪口呆的我甚至没有注意一些醉鬼把他的晚餐吐在了我的鞋里。不过这让那些雇佣兵真的笑惨了。

String.Source: If it's Solitude, there's only one place they could've been taking you.
String.Dest: 如果它在独孤城，只有一个地方他们可以一直带着你。

String.Source: I could hear them laughing all the way back to Narzulbur. That was over a year ago. Haven't left the Stronghold since.
String.Dest: 我能听到他们一路笑着回到纳祖布尔。那是一年多以前的事了。自那以后他们再没有离开过要塞。

String.Source: If it's Solitude, there's only one place they could've been taking you.
String.Dest: 如果它在独孤城，只有一个地方他们可以一直带着你。

String.Source: Sometimes, at night, I can still feel them squirming around me, their fur bristling against my skin, and their tails lashing my face.
String.Dest: 有时候，在夜里，我能感觉到他们在我的周围蠕动，他们的皮毛竖立着朝向我，他们的尾巴鞭打着我的脸颊。

String.Source: If it's Solitude, there's only one place they could've been taking you.
String.Dest: 如果它在独孤城，只有一个地方他们可以一直带着你。

String.Source: So that's why I haven't left. Can't. Not with them rats out there.
String.Dest: 这就是我为什么不愿离开.。不行。我才不跟外面那帮老鼠在一起呢。

String.Source: Ooh. That's unfortunate.
String.Dest: 哦，那真糟糕

String.Source: When the mercs pulled me out, I'd lost it, and by that I mean my courage, but it didn't hit me until later.
String.Dest: 当雇佣兵们把我拉出来时，我已经完全失去勇气了。很久之后我才意识到失去勇气对我造成的影响。

String.Source: Ooh. That's unfortunate.
String.Dest: 哦，那真糟糕

String.Source: They tell me they're going to take me to some tavern to celebrate, near Solitude.
String.Dest: 他们告诉我说他们要把我带到某家靠近独孤城的酒馆里去庆祝。

String.Source: Ooh. That's unfortunate.
String.Dest: 哦，那真糟糕

String.Source: Wouldn't even tell me the name, but I could tell by their snickers that something wasn't right.
String.Dest: 他们甚至没告诉我那名字，但我能从他们嘲笑某些事不对劲的时候多少猜到一些。

String.Source: Ha! I knew all this posturing was a bluff.
String.Dest: 哈！据我所知，所有这样装腔作势的不过是虚张声势罢了。

String.Source: No bluff, and no posturing. I'll take on any Orc in any Stronghold, and by that I mean so long as it's within the walls.
String.Dest: 没有虚张声势，也没有故作姿态，我会干翻所有堡垒里的每一个兽人，并且只要还有站着的，我就会坚持下去。

String.Source: You could recruit new females from other Strongholds.
String.Dest: 你可以从其他的据点招募新的女性。

String.Source: Really, genius? I never thought of that. I thought they'd just abandoned this accursed place.
String.Dest: Really, genius? I never thought of that. I thought they'd just abandoned this accursed place.

String.Source: You could recruit new females from other Strongholds.
String.Dest: 你可以从其他的据点招募新的女性。

String.Source: I mean, it's not like our mine is full of valuable ebony! Oh wait. Like I said, attracting females ain't the problem. It's keeping them alive.
String.Dest: I mean, it's not like our mine is full of valuable ebony! Oh wait. Like I said, attracting females ain't the problem. It's keeping them alive.

String.Source: Malacath would never accept cowards among his children, let alone his chiefs.
String.Dest: 玛拉凯斯可不希望他的孩子里出现懦夫，放开他的首领。

String.Source: You...you don't think he knows, do you? No...of course he doesn't. And by that I mean we've never met.
String.Dest: You...you don't think he knows, do you? No...of course he doesn't. And by that I mean we've never met.

String.Source: You said it. You lead them to their deaths.
String.Dest: 你说过的。你把他们带去送死了。

String.Source: What I lead them to is glory. If they die, then they die gloriously.
String.Dest: 我带领他们寻取荣耀，如果他们死了，那么他们会死的很光荣。

String.Source: You could try and be chief of Narzulbur.
String.Dest: 你可以试试成为纳祖伯的头领。

String.Source: I could be chief of any stronghold if I wanted to, and by that I mean don't. Not this one, anyway.
String.Dest: 只要我想，当上要塞的首领简直易如反掌，也就是说我不想。至少不是这个要塞。

String.Source: You could try and be chief of Narzulbur.
String.Dest: 你可以试试成为纳祖伯的头领。

String.Source: You see, Mauhulakh has a bit of an aunt problem. As in A-U-N-T. And his aunt problem is my aunt problem, although not in the same way.
String.Dest: You see, Mauhulakh has a bit of an aunt problem. As in A-U-N-T. And his aunt problem is my aunt problem, although not in the same way.

String.Source: You could try and be chief of Narzulbur.
String.Dest: 你可以试试成为纳祖伯的头领。

String.Source: I can't touch a hair on his precious head without Bolar and Yatul decorating the walls with my entrails.
String.Dest: 我连他那宝贝脑袋上的一根毫毛都碰不到，除非波拉和雅图尔用我的内脏装饰墙壁。

String.Source: You could try and be chief of Narzulbur.
String.Dest: 你可以试试成为纳祖伯的头领。

String.Source: No, I have my sights set on another stronghold. One with plenty of boon, and by boon I mean...
String.Dest: 不，我把目光投向了另一个要塞。一个拥有大量财富的要塞，为了这些财富，我想...

String.Source: How are things in Narzulbur?
String.Dest: 纳祖伯里一切安好？?

String.Source: Chief Mauhulakh is moping again. Sometimes, I get depressed just thinking about him.
String.Dest: Chief Mauhulakh is moping again. Sometimes, I get depressed just thinking about him.

String.Source: How are things in Narzulbur?
String.Dest: 纳祖伯里一切安好？?

String.Source: The chief thinks he's cursed. Like really cursed. As in ten females die every time someone says his name. Mauhulakh.
String.Dest: The chief thinks he's cursed. Like really cursed. As in ten females die every time someone says his name. Mauhulakh.

String.Source: How are things in Narzulbur?
String.Dest: 纳祖伯里一切安好？?

String.Source: I bet I could make a wife out of Bolar. Yatul too, but more like a widow.
String.Dest: I bet I could make a wife out of Bolar. Yatul too, but more like a widow.

String.Source: How are things in Narzulbur?
String.Dest: 纳祖伯里一切安好？?

String.Source: Dushnamub's the spitting image of his father, and by that I mean I could spit in a bowl and it'd have about the same amount of muscle as both of 'em.
String.Dest: 杜施纳姆酷似他的父亲，我的意思是我可以往碗里吐口水，然后它映照出的杜施纳姆和他父亲的肌肉数量都完全一样。

String.Source: How are things in Narzulbur?
String.Dest: 纳祖伯里一切安好？?

String.Source: Mul and Gadbha. Dumb and dumbest. Sometimes I forget which one's which though. Then Mul opens his mouth.
String.Dest: Mul and Gadbha. Dumb and dumbest. Sometimes I forget which one's which though. Then Mul opens his mouth.

String.Source: That was a major find. Orichalcum is the backbone of the Orc civilization.
String.Dest: 那可真是个大发现。黑铜可是兽人文明的支柱。

String.Source: The problem was the water. I figured we needed to build some scaffolding, but I needed to know how deep the lake was.
String.Dest: 问题在于水深。我觉着我们得做一些脚手架，但首先要知道湖水有多深。

String.Source: That was a major find. Orichalcum is the backbone of the Orc civilization.
String.Dest: 那可真是个大发现。黑铜可是兽人文明的支柱。

String.Source: So I stripped off my armor and dived in. Wasn't until then that I noticed the lake didn't have no reflection.
String.Dest: So I stripped off my armor and dived in. Wasn't until then that I noticed the lake didn't have no reflection.

String.Source: That was a major find. Orichalcum is the backbone of the Orc civilization.
String.Dest: 那可真是个大发现。黑铜可是兽人文明的支柱。

String.Source: Seems when I got my bell rung I lost my hearing too. Turns out, I wasn't diving in no lake, at least no lake of water.
String.Dest: Seems when I got my bell rung I lost my hearing too. Turns out, I wasn't diving in no lake, at least no lake of water.

String.Source: That was a major find. Orichalcum is the backbone of the Orc civilization.
String.Dest: 那可真是个大发现。黑铜可是兽人文明的支柱。

String.Source: It was a lake of...fur. Skeevers.
String.Dest: 这是……由毛皮组成的湖啊。雪鼠的毛皮。

String.Source: So, what was the problem?
String.Dest: 那么，问题是啥？

String.Source: The problem was the water. I figured we needed to build some scaffolding, but I needed to know how deep the lake was.
String.Dest: 问题在于水深。我觉着我们得做一些脚手架，但首先要知道湖水有多深。

String.Source: So, what was the problem?
String.Dest: 那么，问题是啥？

String.Source: So I stripped off my armor and dived in. Wasn't until then that I noticed the lake didn't have no reflection.
String.Dest: So I stripped off my armor and dived in. Wasn't until then that I noticed the lake didn't have no reflection.

String.Source: So, what was the problem?
String.Dest: 那么，问题是啥？

String.Source: Seems when I got my bell rung I lost my hearing too. Turns out, I wasn't diving in no lake, at least no lake of water.
String.Dest: Seems when I got my bell rung I lost my hearing too. Turns out, I wasn't diving in no lake, at least no lake of water.

String.Source: So, what was the problem?
String.Dest: 那么，问题是啥？

String.Source: It was a lake of...fur. Skeevers.
String.Dest: It was a lake of...fur. Skeevers.

String.Source: What happened after you reached the mine?
String.Dest: 你到达矿井后发生了什么？

String.Source: I charged ahead and did what I had to do. Wreak havoc. Didn't even the need the mercs. Killed all them Snow Elves and the bugs they keep as pets.
String.Dest: I charged ahead and did what I had to do. Wreak havoc. Didn't even the need the mercs. Killed all them Snow Elves and the bugs they keep as pets.

String.Source: What happened after you reached the mine?
String.Dest: 你到达矿井后发生了什么？

String.Source: One of them bugs did manage to get me from behind. Rung my bell pretty good before I gave its face an airhole.
String.Dest: One of them bugs did manage to get me from behind. Rung my bell pretty good before I gave its face an airhole.

String.Source: What happened after you reached the mine?
String.Dest: 你到达矿井后发生了什么？

String.Source: Toward the back of the cave there was this narrow passageway. It led to a larger opening filled with a giant lake, but the prize was above.
String.Dest: Toward the back of the cave there was this narrow passageway. It led to a larger opening filled with a giant lake, but the prize was above.

String.Source: What happened after you reached the mine?
String.Dest: 你到达矿井后发生了什么？

String.Source: Wall to wall of ore deposits, gleaming with untapped veins. Not iron or silver, but the good stuff, and by that I mean Orichalcum.
String.Dest: 这满地的矿石，其间还有闪亮的未开发过的矿脉，不是铁或者银，而是，更珍贵的黑铜。

String.Source: If Bolar and Yatul were young, you could take them as wives.
String.Dest: 如果波拉和雅图尔还年轻，你可以把他俩看作是夫妻。

String.Source: Yeah, and if my mother was a goat then you'd be kin. But those two aren't young, so it's no use thinking about it.
String.Dest: Yeah, and if my mother was a goat then you'd be kin. But those two aren't young, so it's no use thinking about it.

String.Source: If Bolar and Yatul were young, you could take them as wives.
String.Dest: 如果波拉和雅图尔还年轻，你可以把他俩看作是夫妻。

String.Source: Besides, I plan on having more than two wives, and that ain't something those two ogrims will ever accept.
String.Dest: 另外，我打算娶两个以上的老婆，而我的那两个巨魔似的姑娘估计都不会接受这种事。

String.Source: (Point and laugh)
String.Dest: （指着笑）

String.Source: Go ahead grub, laugh it up, get it all out of your system before I punch it out of you.
String.Dest: 继续，蛆虫。笑一笑，在我揍得你把它全都吐出来之前，赶紧自觉点把它从你身体里全部拿出来。

String.Source: What do you think of the other Stronghold members?
String.Dest: 你对据点里的其他成员怎么看？

String.Source: Our chief is a lonely weakling, constantly reminiscing about his dead wives.
String.Dest: 我们的族长是个沉浸在他死去的老婆们的记忆中的寂寞的懦夫。

String.Source: What do you think of the other Stronghold members?
String.Dest: 你对据点里的其他成员怎么看？

String.Source: His son, Dushnamub, works the forge all day, and eats all night, yet somehow manages to excel at malnourishment.
String.Dest: 他的儿子，杜施纳姆，整天在作坊工作，整夜在吃东西，但不知怎么还是营养不良。

String.Source: What do you think of the other Stronghold members?
String.Dest: 你对据点里的其他成员怎么看？

String.Source: His daughter, Urog, is blind, and by that I mean blind to the truth.
String.Dest: 他的女儿，沃戈，是个瞎子，我是说她总是对事实视而不见。

String.Source: What do you think of the other Stronghold members?
String.Dest: 你对据点里的其他成员怎么看？

String.Source: The miners, Mul and Gadbha, are from Largashbur. I hear their chief is even more pathetic than ours, but at least he has wives.
String.Dest: The miners, Mul and Gadbha, are from Largashbur. I hear their chief is even more pathetic than ours, but at least he has wives.

String.Source: What do you think of the other Stronghold members?
String.Dest: 你对据点里的其他成员怎么看？

String.Source: And then there's Bolar and Yatul. You don't even want to know the sorts of things they're up to, and by that I mean you'll find out soon enough.
String.Dest: And then there's Bolar and Yatul. You don't even want to know the sorts of things they're up to, and by that I mean you'll find out soon enough.

String.Source: What do you think of the other Stronghold members?
String.Dest: 你对据点里的其他成员怎么看？

String.Source: But don't mistake my complaining for a lack of loyalty. The tribe comes first, and until I'm chief of my own Stronghold, this sorry lot is my kin.
String.Dest: But don't mistake my complaining for a lack of loyalty. The tribe comes first, and until I'm chief of my own Stronghold, this sorry lot is my kin.

String.Source: What are you afraid of?
String.Dest: 你在害怕什么？

String.Source: Well, I suppose you think, given my impressive stature, that I'm afraid of something like ghosts, dragons, or sword-wielding ghost dragons.
String.Dest: 呃，既然你已经知道了我的地位如此之高，我猜你会觉得我害怕一些像是幽灵啊，龙啊，或是挥着剑的幽灵龙啊之类的东西。

String.Source: What are you afraid of?
String.Dest: 你在害怕什么？

String.Source: Nothing like that. It happened about a year ago, in some cave to the northwest.
String.Dest: Nothing like that. It happened about a year ago, in some cave to the northwest.

String.Source: What are you afraid of?
String.Dest: 你在害怕什么？

String.Source: I was scouting for ore deposits, looking for a place to set up a new Stronghold. My Stronghold.
String.Dest: I was scouting for ore deposits, looking for a place to set up a new Stronghold. My Stronghold.

String.Source: What are you afraid of?
String.Dest: 你在害怕什么？

String.Source: Had a couple mercs with me. Didn't want to tip Mauhulakh off to the fact I was leaving.
String.Dest: Had a couple mercs with me. Didn't want to tip Mauhulakh off to the fact I was leaving.

String.Source: What are you afraid of?
String.Dest: 你在害怕什么？

String.Source: Only this cave was filled with them pasty Elves, and by that I mean Falmer. Naturally, I charged on ahead.
String.Dest: 只不过这个洞穴都是那群苍白的精灵，就是雪精灵。自然是我先进去了。

String.Source: What are you afraid of?
String.Dest: 你在害怕什么？

String.Source: Some Orcs follow to the death. I lead 'em to death. Don't look at me like that. You know what I mean.
String.Dest: 有的兽人顺其自然地死。而我领着他们去死。别那么看着我。你懂我的意思。

String.Source: The man who vomited on you. I think I've met him. His name's Jaspar Gaerston.
String.Dest: 吐在你身上的那个人，我好像认识。他的全名是叫 贾斯帕·盖尔斯顿

String.Source: Well tell him he owes me a new pair of boots.
String.Dest: 好吧，告诉他，他欠我一双新靴子。

String.Source: Urog is wife enough. She could bear you many strong children.
String.Dest: 沃戈是个好妻子。她可以替你生下许多健壮的孩子。

String.Source: Yeah, Urog's a fine female, and venison's a fine meat. But maybe some days I want a rabbit haunch. Or some sabrecat steak.
String.Dest: Yeah, Urog's a fine female, and venison's a fine meat. But maybe some days I want a rabbit haunch. Or some sabrecat steak.

String.Source: Urog is wife enough. She could bear you many strong children.
String.Dest: 沃戈是个好妻子。她可以替你生下许多健壮的孩子。

String.Source: Maybe I don't want to eat venison every day until my tongue falls off from boredom. Only with females, I ain't talking about no tongue.
String.Dest: Maybe I don't want to eat venison every day until my tongue falls off from boredom. Only with females, I ain't talking about no tongue.

String.Source: Urog is wife enough. She could bear you many strong children.
String.Dest: 沃戈是个好妻子。她可以替你生下许多健壮的孩子。

String.Source: Of course, that's assuming Yatul will even let me have her. Which won't happen unless I'm chief. And that won't happen so long as Mauhulakh lives.
String.Dest: Of course, that's assuming Yatul will even let me have her. Which won't happen unless I'm chief. And that won't happen so long as Mauhulakh lives.

String.Source: I understood what you meant.
String.Dest: 我是明白你的意思的。

String.Source: Really? Because I almost saw the worms you call lips curl into a smirk.
String.Dest: 真的？我都能看见你们这些混蛋是怎么从脸上挤出那假笑来。

String.Source: I understood what you meant.
String.Dest: 我是明白你的意思的。

String.Source: Really? Because I almost saw whatever you beasts call lips curl into a smirk.
String.Dest: 真的？我都能看见你们这些混蛋是怎么从脸上挤出那假笑来的。

String.Source: Yes, yes, I know what you mean.
String.Dest: 是的，是的，我知道你什么意思。

String.Source: Do you, because you look a little confused, and by a little I mean you're completely dumbfounded. Emphasis on the dumb.
String.Dest: Do you, because you look a little confused, and by a little I mean you're completely dumbfounded. Emphasis on the dumb.

String.Source: We all have our fears. The key is to overcome them.
String.Dest: 我们都会感到恐惧，重要的是我们要克服它。

String.Source: I know that! I'm working on mine, it's just been taking longer than I expected is all, and by that I mean an entire year longer.
String.Dest: 我知道！我在做我自己的工作，它只是花费了比我预想的更长的时间而已，更长的时间我指的是一整年。

String.Source: If your sword is as sharp as your mouth, you could be chief.
String.Dest: 如果你的剑和你的嘴一样锋利，你就能当首领。.

String.Source: I will be chief someday, and by someday I mean soon. Very soon.
String.Dest: 总有一天我会当上首领，我说的总有一天是很快的意思。非常快。

String.Source: You could challenge the chief of another Stronghold.
String.Dest: 你可以去找别的要塞的首领挑战。

String.Source: I could, but the weather ain't good for traveling, and by that I mean I'm afraid. Oh wait. Nngh...By Malacath, I wasn't supposed to tell you that.
String.Dest: I could, but the weather ain't good for traveling, and by that I mean I'm afraid. Oh wait. Nngh...By Malacath, I wasn't supposed to tell you that.

String.Source: Finally, away from you.
String.Dest: 我终于摆脱你了。

String.Source: Alright then.
String.Dest: 那好吧。

String.Source: Goodbye.
String.Dest: 再见。

String.Source: Until next time.
String.Dest: 下回见。

String.Source: Something on your mind?
String.Dest: 你有什么心事吗？

String.Source: Something on your mind?
String.Dest: 有什么想法？

String.Source: Speak.
String.Dest: 说。

String.Source: What do you want? Can't you see I'm busy being amazing?
String.Dest: What do you want? Can't you see I'm busy being amazing?

String.Source: Make it quick.
String.Dest: 快点好吗？

String.Source: Come on horker meat, I haven't got all day.
String.Dest: 快来吧三牙海象之肉，我每天都想得到它。

String.Source: Yes?
String.Dest: 什么？

String.Source: What?
String.Dest: 什么？

String.Source: How do you know the scene hasn't been tampered with?
String.Dest: 你们怎么能确保现在看到的这些没有被篡改过。

String.Source: Not many people can find the place, to be honest, since it's not on any map.
String.Dest: 说实话，没多少人能找到这个地方。因为那里在任何一份地图上都没有标示。

String.Source: How do you know the scene hasn't been tampered with?
String.Dest: 你们怎么能确保现在看到的这些没有被篡改过。

String.Source: The only reason the guard were able to arrest my father is because he was forced to spend the night in Solitude.
String.Dest: 守卫逮捕我父亲唯一可行的理由就是他非自愿而不得不在独孤城过了一夜。
